original_text: And it came to pass, when all the people were clean passed over Jordan, that the Lord spake unto Joshua, saying,
korean_text: 그 모든 백성이 요단을 건너가기를 마치매 여호와께서 여호수아에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: when all the people were clean passed over Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성이 요단을 깨끗이 건너갔을 때

sentences.original_text: that the Lord spake unto Joshua
